Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.prckt.krowemarf.struct.Server.£Server
      • com.prckt.krowemarf.struct.Server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _Runnable

    public final class Server
extends £Server
implements _Runnable

    Server

    Server class provided method fro add and remove component that will be serve

    This class implement the £Server interface end the _Runnable interface _Runnable allows tu use the run() method to launch the server.

      • run

        public int run​()
        throws java.io.IOException,
               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This method allows to run the server. Need to call them first. Open the connection with database and check if table exist or not. Initialize the rmi server by binding all the components Check if if the tables for the operation of the components exist in data base
        Specified by:
        run in interface _Runnable
        Returns:
        0 if the server start correctly
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        RemoteException

      • stop

        public void stop​()
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                 java.rmi.NotBoundException,
                 java.sql.SQLException
        Method call when the server shutdown. call all stop() methods of each component in the component manager to close them. Unbind all managers from the rmi registry to stop the server.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface _Runnable
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.rmi.NotBoundException
        java.sql.SQLException
